dimensions:
Ribbon: 10 x 5.8 cm (3 15/16 x 2 5/16 in.)
Tassel: 3.8 cm
title: Commemorative ribbon badge
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: plain weave with supplementary weft
description: Ribbon of fine white ribbed silk with head and shoulders of Queen Elizabeth finely brocaded in purple silk with inscription below: "H. M. QUEEN ELIZABETH II 1953 This tassel is made of Lullingstone Silk which will be used in Coronation Robes." Lower end folded to form point, from which hangs a purple silk tassel.  This ribbon commemorates Elizabeth's Coronation.
name: Commemorative ribbon badge
